metadata.title: Studios Multi-Platform Native Section - Premium 3D Rotation & Parallax

story.asA: a developer implementing Epic 2 content strategy and premium components
story.iWant: to create a MultiPlatformCards component with research-validated platform-specific messaging and premium 3D rotation reveals with parallax depth layers
story.soThat: users understand Cre8tive AI's multi-platform native optimization advantage through distinctive hexagon-shaped cards with magnetic pull interactions and dramatic 3D entrance animations that showcase all 6 major platforms (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, Facebook)

criterion.title: MultiPlatformCards Component Structure
criterion.description: Create src/components/studios/MultiPlatformCards.tsx component with section header "Native for Every Major Platform", PlatformCard sub-component using OrganicCard shape="hexagon", props interface MultiPlatformCardsProps, responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 tablet, 3 desktop)

criterion.title: Platform Card Content (6 Platforms)
criterion.description: PLATFORM_DATA const with 6 platforms: YouTube (16:9, 3 features), TikTok (9:16, 3 features), Instagram (1:1 & 4:5, 3 features), LinkedIn (1:1 & 16:9, 3 features), X/Twitter (16:9 & 1:1, 3 features), Facebook (1:1 & 16:9, 3 features). Each card displays icon (SVG), name, format label, 3 bullets. OrganicCard uses hexagon shape.

criterion.title: Parallax Depth Layers (3-Layer Background Animation)
criterion.description: 3 parallax layers with GSAP ScrollTrigger: Layer 1 (Background, 0.2x scroll, indigo/cyan gradients), Layer 2 (Midground, 0.5x scroll, fuchsia/orange shapes), Layer 3 (Foreground, 1.0x normal scroll, platform cards). Absolutely positioned behind cards grid.

criterion.title: 3D Y-Axis Rotation Reveal (Dramatic Entrance)
criterion.description: GSAP ScrollTrigger 3D rotation: initial rotationY: 90 (edge-on), final rotationY: 0 (face viewer). Stagger from center outward. Easing: back.out(1.4) for overshoot. Duration: 1.2s per card, 0.15s stagger. CSS: perspective: 1000px on container, transform-style: preserve-3d on cards.

criterion.title: Magnetic Pull Interaction (Premium Pattern)
criterion.description: useMagneticPull hook on all 6 platform cards. Config: strength 0.3, maxDistance 30px, trigger radius 150px. Throttled to 60fps (16ms). Mobile: disabled <768px (touch screens). Smooth GSAP cursor-following pull effect.

doc.title: Frontend Architecture
doc.snippet: Component Template Checklist: - TypeScript interface for props (exported) - JSDoc comment with description - Semantic HTML tags (<article>, <section>) for SEO - cn() utility for className merging - Responsive classes (Tailwind breakpoints) - Loading strategy (loading="lazy" for images)

doc.title: Animation Patterns & Best Practices
doc.snippet:
Parallax Effect Pattern: - Background moves slower (depth illusion) - gsap.to('.bg', { y: '30%', ease: 'none', scrollTrigger: { scrub: true } }) - Different y percentages create depth perception - Use will-change: transform for GPU acceleration
3D Rotation with ScrollTrigger: - Use rotationY property for Y-axis rotation - Set perspective on container, transform-style: preserve-3d on cards - Back.out easing adds overshoot effect

constraint.description: Component must follow frontend-architecture.md Component Template Pattern: TypeScript interface exported, JSDoc comment, semantic HTML, cn() utility, responsive classes, lazy loading.

60fps non-negotiable for all animations. Render budget: ≤16.67ms per frame. Magnetic pull: ≤2ms, GSAP timeline: ≤5ms, Parallax layers: ≤3ms, Layout/paint: ≤6ms. Mobile optimization: disable 3D rotation and magnetic pull on <768px.
constraint.source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md lines 630-654, Performance Budget Table lines 656-665

constraint.description: Use Epic 2 foundation components (Story 2.0): OrganicCard shape="hexagon", useMagneticPull hook, CRE8TIVE_EASINGS. Import pattern: import { OrganicCard, useMagneticPull } from '@/components/epic2'

GSAP ScrollTrigger pattern: use gsap.context() with cleanup in useEffect return. Never nest ScrollTriggers inside timeline tweens. Animate transform and opacity only (GPU acceleration). Support prefers-reduced-motion (static shapes, instant reveals).

Tailwind CSS only. Mobile-first responsive (no prefix = mobile, md: = tablet+). Breakpoints: sm:640px, md:768px, lg:1024px, xl:1280px. Glassmorphism patterns: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/20.
All copy must match COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md word-for-word. No invention, no placeholders, no deviation from provided copy. Platform names, format labels, feature bullets all verbatim from guide.
TypeScript relaxed mode (noImplicitAny: false). Build: npm run build passes with 0 errors. Lint: npm run lint passes (0 errors, warnings acceptable). No console.log in production code.

interface.name: OrganicCard (Epic 2 Foundation)
interface.signature: function OrganicCard({ children, shape = 'blob', glowColor?, morphing = false, morphIntensity = 0.05, className? }: OrganicCardProps): JSX.Element
interface.usage: Use shape="hexagon" for platform cards. Optional morphing animation (set morphing={true} for breathing effect). Optional glowColor for SVG glow filter (max 3 per viewport).

interface.name: useMagneticPull (Epic 2 Foundation)
interface.signature:
function useMagneticPull(options?: MagneticPullOptions): RefObject<HTMLDivElement>
interface MagneticPullOptions { strength?: number; // Default: 0.3 maxDistance?: number; // Default: 30 ease?: string; // Default: 'power2.out' rotation?: boolean; // Default: false rotationIntensity?: number; // Default: 0.1 }
interface.usage: Apply to all platform cards. Automatically throttles to 60fps, disables on mobile <768px. Returns ref to attach to card element. Config: strength: 0.3, maxDistance: 30, trigger radius: 150px (hardcoded).

interface.name: GSAP ScrollTrigger (Global)
interface.usage: Use for 3D rotation reveal and parallax layers. Pattern: gsap.context() with cleanup in useEffect return. 3D rotation: rotationY: 90 → 0 with back.out easing. Parallax: multiple gsap.to() with different y percentages and scrub: true.

interface.name: PlatformConfig (To Be Defined)
interface.usage: Define 6 platform configurations matching COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md exactly. Export as PLATFORM_DATA constant. Pass to MultiPlatformCards component.

interface.name: Lenis (Global Smooth Scroll)
interface.usage: Already configured globally in App.tsx. Provides smooth scroll foundation for parallax and ScrollTrigger animations. No additional setup required for this story.

standards.paragraph: Manual testing only (zero automated tests per project standards). Test checklist includes: Component rendering (all 6 platforms, hexagon shapes), 3D rotation animation (rotationY: 90 → 0, stagger from center, back.out easing), Parallax layers (3 distinct scroll speeds), Magnetic pull (hover trigger, ≤30px movement, 16ms throttle, mobile disabled), Responsive layouts (1/2/3 columns at 375px/768px/1024px+), Performance (60fps in Chrome DevTools Performance tab), Copy accuracy (word-for-word match to COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md), Build & Code quality (npm run build passes, npm run lint passes).

idea.description: Component Rendering: Verify MultiPlatformCards renders with proper section header, 6 platform cards in responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 tablet, 3 desktop), all PlatformCard sub-components use OrganicCard with shape="hexagon".

Platform Content: Verify all 6 platforms render correctly (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, Facebook), format labels match copy guide exactly (16:9, 9:16, 1:1 & 4:5, etc.), 3 feature bullets per platform display verbatim from guide, platform icons display at correct size.

Parallax Layers: Verify 3 parallax layers scroll at different speeds (Background slowest 0.2x, Midground medium 0.5x, Foreground normal 1.0x), gradient backgrounds positioned absolutely behind cards, parallax smooth at 60fps in Performance tab.

3D Rotation: Verify cards start rotationY: 90 (edge-on), animate to rotationY: 0 (face viewer), stagger from center outward (center cards animate first), overshoot effect visible (back.out easing), all 6 cards complete rotation sequence in ~1.2s with 0.15s stagger.

Magnetic Pull: Hover platform card from 150px away, verify pull triggers, measure pull distance ≤30px from center, test mousemove throttle (16ms interval in Performance tab), verify mobile disabled (<768px viewport).

Copy Accuracy: Compare section header, subheader, platform feature bullets, closing copy paragraph to COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md lines 110-192, verify word-for-word match (no deviation, no placeholders).

Responsive & Performance: Test mobile (375px, 1 col, static hexagons, no 3D, no magnetic pull, reduced parallax), tablet (768px, 2 cols, 3D enabled, magnetic pull enabled, full parallax), desktop (1024px+, 3 cols, full features), verify 60fps at all breakpoints.
Integration: Verify MultiPlatformCards imports into Studios.tsx, placed after PortfolioSection (Story 2.1), Lenis smooth scroll works, no layout shifts (CLS ≤0.1 in Lighthouse), no console errors.

Build & Code Quality: Run npm run build (verify 0 TypeScript errors), run npm run lint (verify 0 errors), check React cleanup (ctx.revert() in useEffect return for GSAP contexts), verify no console.log in production code.
